name: Galle Fort
description: Historic Dutch colonial fort with cobblestone streets, ancient walls, and stunning ocean views. Perfect for history lovers and photographers.

name: Sigiriya Rock Fortress
description: Ancient rock citadel with stunning frescoes, beautiful gardens, and panoramic views. An UNESCO World Heritage site known as Lion Rock.

name: Temple of the Sacred Tooth Relic
description: Sacred Buddhist temple housing the tooth relic of Buddha. Beautiful architecture and rich cultural significance.

name: Mirissa Beach
description: Beautiful sandy beach perfect for swimming, whale watching, and surfing. Known for its stunning sunsets and relaxed atmosphere.

name: Ella Rock
description: Scenic hiking destination with breathtaking mountain views and tea plantations. Popular among trekkers and nature lovers.

name: Yala National Park
description: Premier wildlife sanctuary famous for leopards, elephants, and diverse bird species. Best safari experience in Sri Lanka.

name: Nuwara Eliya
description: Hill station known as 'Little England' with cool climate, tea plantations, and colonial architecture.

name: Anuradhapura
description: Ancient capital with sacred Buddhist temples, stupas, and archaeological ruins dating back over 2000 years.

name: Trincomalee Beach
description: Pristine beaches with crystal clear waters, perfect for snorkeling, diving, and whale watching.

name: Polonnaruwa
description: Ancient city with well-preserved ruins, Buddhist temples, and royal palaces from the medieval period.

name: Adam's Peak
description: Sacred mountain pilgrimage site with stunning sunrise views. Popular hiking destination with religious significance.

name: Bentota Beach
description: Golden sandy beach resort area perfect for water sports, luxury resorts, and family vacations.

name: Horton Plains National Park
description: Montane grassland with World's End cliff, Baker's Falls, and diverse endemic wildlife.

name: Dambulla Cave Temple
description: Ancient Buddhist cave complex with beautiful paintings and statues dating back 2000 years.

name: Udawalawe National Park
description: Renowned for large herds of elephants and diverse bird species around the reservoir.

name: Temple of the king walagamba hidden
description: Ancient mountain citadel with stunning forest, beautiful gardens, and panoramic views. A beautiful temple in top of mountain
